overview: David Trent is a nobleman who forms an outlaw group to combat his evil uncle Sir Edgar Bullard. The outlaws of Sherwood Forest are championing young Roger Mowbray, really Prince Richard, whose right to the throne is being usurped by an evil regent.
tagline: Sherwood Forest Rings to the Cry of Glorious Battle in This Thrilling Serial Spectacle!
title: Son of the Guardsman
